dataSetInformation.common:synonyms: Aluminum enclosure; Aluminium casing; Metal housing; Alloy shell; Aluminum chassis; Aluminium cover; Aluminum box
Aluminum enclosure; Aluminium casing; Metal housing; Alloy shell; Aluminum chassis; Aluminium cover; Aluminum box
dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The product flow describes an aluminum housing, emphasizing its level of processing and various technical aspects. These aspects include any treatments it has undergone, compliance with relevant standards, quality ratings, information on how it is used, the process by which it was produced, and the name of the initial material or precursor. Furthermore, the description outlines whether the aluminum housing is included in a production or consumption mix and notes its point of availability, differentiated as either 'to consumer' or 'at plant', with each detail enumerated and partitioned by commas.
产品流描述了铝制外壳，强调其加工级别和各种技术方面。这些方面包括铝制外壳所经历的任何处理、符合相关标准的合规性、质量评级、如何使用的信息、生产过程以及初始材料或前体的名称。此外，描述还概述了铝制外壳是否包含在生产或消费混合物中，并指出其可用性的位置，区分为“向消费者”或“在工厂”，每个细节都被枚举和分隔开。
